purpose: To provide a general-purpose AI framework that can be customized for different applications and environments
principle: Built on Python with support for multimodal inputs and large language models, enabling versatile AI agent development
reusability: Modular architecture allowing for easy integration and customization; supports various plugins and API extensions
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and limited documentation
name: Aeiva
description: A general AI agent framework that can be adapted to various tasks and environments.
highlight: Flexible and adaptable AI agent framework for various tasks and environments
